title: Multi-modal natural dialogue
proctitle: CHI '92: Proceedings of the SIGCHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems

references.text: Argyle, M. & Cook, M. Gaze and Mutual Gaze. Cambridge University Press, Cambridge, England, 1975.
Bolt, R. A. The Human Interface. Lifetime Learning Publications, Belmont, CA, 1984.
Bolt, R. A. The Integrated Multi-Modal Interface. In Transactions of the Institute of Electronics, information, and Communication Engineers (Japan), (Nov. Vol. J70-D, No. 11, 1987), pp. 2017-2025.
Britton, Brent C.J. Enhancing Computer-Human Interaction With Animated Facial Expressions. Unpublished Master's Thesis, Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Cambridge, Massachusetts, 1991.

Nespoulous, J-L, & Lecours, A. R. Gestures: Nature and Function. In The Biological foundations of Gestures: Motor and Semiotic Aspects, J-L. Nespoulous, P. Perron, & A. Roch (eds.). Lawrence Erlbaum Associates, Hillsdale, NJ, 1986, pp. 49-62.
